wikipedia_page.main: Nia Roberts is a Welsh radio and television presenter.

link_mentions.page: BBC Cardiff Singer of the World competition

response: Côr Cymru is a Welsh TV competition searching for the best choir in Wales, which airs every 2 years on S4C. The first series was presented by Aled Jones and Heledd Cynwal in 2003, but subsequent series have been fronted by Nia Roberts and Gareth Owen.
*Nia Roberts (presenter), Welsh radio and television presenter
